title: Zeke and Ned
description: The producers of the miniseries Streets of Laredo now present the story of the last two Cherokee warriors--Zeke Proctor and Ned Christie--and their struggle to remain true to their Indian ways. Focusing on Ned and Zeke's loyalty to their heritage and determination to be judged by Indian justice at a time when white men were trying to take judicial power away from the Cherokee nation, Zeke and Ned is prime McMurtry.
author: Larry McMurtry
